title: Unable to create PBE account
body:
I recently checked in on my PBE status, to find out that I was accepted. I immediately installed the launcher, and am downloading the client as I write this. For some peculiar reason, I cannot create and account for this, as the page doesn't load correctly. Please help me understand what this problem is and how to fix it, thank you in advance.

Screenshot of the error:
http://i.imgur.com/Qm0Dfoj.png

replies.body: Congrats on your acceptance!  The PBE Page is down for maintenance right now, though, so players won't be able to access the site without running into issues.  We'll be posting updates on the [PBE status page ](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe)as they become available.  Hang tight!
